Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Western. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Keeler
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Midway (Orange Line), Cicero, Archer, Pulaski & 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Keeler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Midway (Orange Line), Cicero, Archer, Pulaski & 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Keeler.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Cicero, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Cicero, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.
